name: Pagotopia
description:
The game begins with some small city tiles representing the society. On the screen is displayed an UI that shows the state of this city (state of happiness, luxury needs, etc.) The player has to balance that variables by designing the city with various map tiles and items.

Made by: Jan Suchanek (JanKenway), Paula Shrayber (pixelliyon), Felix Mundschenk (Benner / Uthak), Sophie Halim Kawakami (sophiehalkwm)


//
Music: One Man  Book - 01 Early Flight Ketsa - Dandy

Sound: 

Cow Sound  -  https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/cow/ Champagne Cork 1 - Joseph SARDIN Wind in tall Grass- Joseph SARDIN

Fonts: Just For Fun - Kevin Richey (https://www.1001fonts.com/users/kevindrichey/)
